name: Party Animals (itch)
description:
2D Sidescroller rhythm game in which you automatically jump every beat at 100bpm

Made for the 100th Weekly Game Jam with the theme "100"
And of course you can collect 100 carrots

Made by
MissingTheMoon:   Game Designer / Animator
